create or replace PACKAGE pdm_ppt_tapi_pck
IS
-- Table API package for table pdm_process_products
-- Generated by VI TAPI generator version 6.2  (TAPI generated 03-Jan-2022  05:41:00)

-- Generated global constants

g_con_table_name  CONSTANT     VARCHAR2(61) := 'PDM_PROCESS_PRODUCTS';
g_lock_conflicts  PLS_INTEGER := 0;


FUNCTION ppt_select_row( i_ppt_PDT_ID   IN  pdm_process_products.PDT_ID%TYPE
 , i_ppt_PCS_ID   IN  pdm_process_products.PCS_ID%TYPE
                       , o_rt_ppt   OUT pdm_process_products%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION ppt_select_row_upd( i_ppt_PDT_ID   IN  pdm_process_products.PDT_ID%TYPE
                           , i_ppt_PCS_ID   IN  pdm_process_products.PCS_ID%TYPE
                           , o_rt_ppt   OUT pdm_process_products%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

PROCEDURE ppt_lock_row( i_ppt_PDT_ID   IN  pdm_process_products.PDT_ID%TYPE
 , i_ppt_PCS_ID   IN  pdm_process_products.PCS_ID%TYPE )
;

PROCEDURE ppt_lock_row_nowait( i_ppt_PDT_ID   IN  pdm_process_products.PDT_ID%TYPE
 , i_ppt_PCS_ID   IN  pdm_process_products.PCS_ID%TYPE )
;

PROCEDURE ppt_insert_row ( io_rt_ppt  IN OUT pdm_process_products%ROWTYPE )
;

FUNCTION ppt_update_row( i_ppt_PDT_ID   IN     pdm_process_products.PDT_ID%TYPE
                        , i_ppt_PCS_ID   IN     pdm_process_products.PCS_ID%TYPE
                       , io_rt_ppt  IN OUT pdm_process_products%ROWTYPE )
RETURN NUMBER
;

FUNCTION ppt_delete_row( i_ppt_PDT_ID   IN  pdm_process_products.PDT_ID%TYPE
                         , i_ppt_PCS_ID   IN  pdm_process_products.PCS_ID%TYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;


END pdm_ppt_tapi_pck;
/




package body pdm_ppt_tapi_pck
is




function ppt_select_row( i_ppt_pdt_id   in  pdm_process_products.pdt_id%type
 , i_ppt_pcs_id   in  pdm_process_products.pcs_id%type
                       , o_rt_ppt   out pdm_process_products%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ppt_select_row';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_ppt ( i_ppt_pdt_id   in  pdm_process_products.pdt_id%type
 , i_ppt_pcs_id   in  pdm_process_products.pcs_id%type )
      is 
           select *
             from pdm_process_products ppt
            where ppt.pdt_id = i_ppt_pdt_id 
              and ppt.pcs_id = i_ppt_pcs_id ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_ppt( i_ppt_pdt_id => i_ppt_pdt_id, i_ppt_pcs_id => i_ppt_pcs_id );
         fetch c_ppt into o_rt_ppt;
         l_found := c_ppt%found;
         close c_ppt;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc 
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_ppt%isopen
         then
            close c_ppt;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end ppt_select_row;

function ppt_select_row_upd( i_ppt_pdt_id   in  pdm_process_products.pdt_id%type
                           , i_ppt_pcs_id   in  pdm_process_products.pcs_id%type
                           , o_rt_ppt   out pdm_process_products%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ppt_select_row_upd';
   l_found                boolean      := false;

   cursor c_ppt ( i_ppt_pdt_id   in  pdm_process_products.pdt_id%type
                , i_ppt_pcs_id   in  pdm_process_products.pcs_id%type )
   is
           select *
             from pdm_process_products ppt
            where ppt.pdt_id = i_ppt_pdt_id 
                and ppt.pcs_id = i_ppt_pcs_id 
         for update;
begin
   viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

   
   open c_ppt( i_ppt_pdt_id => i_ppt_pdt_id
, i_ppt_pcs_id => i_ppt_pcs_id );
   fetch c_ppt into o_rt_ppt;
   l_found := c_ppt%found;
   close c_ppt;

   viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                          , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

   return l_found;

exception
   when others
   then
      if c_ppt%isopen
      then
         close c_ppt;
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );

end ppt_select_row_upd;

procedure ppt_lock_row( i_ppt_pdt_id   in  pdm_process_products.pdt_id%type
 , i_ppt_pcs_id   in  pdm_process_products.pcs_id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ppt_lock_row';
begin
  declare
     cursor c_ppt ( i_ppt_pdt_id   in  pdm_process_products.pdt_id%type
 , i_ppt_pcs_id   in  pdm_process_products.pcs_id%type )
     is
             select ''
               from pdm_process_products ppt
              where ppt.pdt_id = i_ppt_pdt_id 
                and ppt.pcs_id = i_ppt_pcs_id 
         for update;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         
         if i_ppt_pdt_id is not null
            or i_ppt_pcs_id is not null
         then
            begin
                
                ppt_lock_row_nowait( i_ppt_pdt_id => i_ppt_pdt_id
, i_ppt_pcs_id => i_ppt_pcs_id );
            exception
               when viu_constant.exc_lockfailed
               then
                  
                  g_lock_conflicts := g_lock_conflicts + 1;

                  
                  viu_info.reset_package_variables;

                  
                  open c_ppt( i_ppt_pdt_id => i_ppt_pdt_id, i_ppt_pcs_id => i_ppt_pcs_id );
                  close c_ppt;
               end;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_ppt%isopen
         then
            close c_ppt;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end ppt_lock_row;

procedure ppt_lock_row_nowait( i_ppt_pdt_id   in  pdm_process_products.pdt_id%type
 , i_ppt_pcs_id   in  pdm_process_products.pcs_id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ppt_lock_row_nowait';
begin
   declare
      cursor c_ppt ( i_ppt_pdt_id   in  pdm_process_products.pdt_id%type
 , i_ppt_pcs_id   in  pdm_process_products.pcs_id%type )
      is
              select ''
                from pdm_process_products ppt
               where ppt.pdt_id = i_ppt_pdt_id 
                 and ppt.pcs_id = i_ppt_pcs_id 
          for update nowait;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin

         
         if i_ppt_pdt_id is not null
         or i_ppt_pcs_id is not null
         then
            
            open c_ppt( i_ppt_pdt_id => i_ppt_pdt_id, i_ppt_pcs_id => i_ppt_pcs_id );

            close c_ppt;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
        if c_ppt%isopen
        then
           close c_ppt;
        end if;

        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

        viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_lockfailed
                           , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                           , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                           , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                           , i_additional_data   =>   'PDT_ID = "'||i_ppt_pdt_id||'"'
                                                       ||', PCS_ID = "'||i_ppt_pcs_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end ppt_lock_row_nowait;

function ppt_perform_update( i_ppt_pdt_id   in     pdm_process_products.pdt_id%type
 , i_ppt_pcs_id   in     pdm_process_products.pcs_id%type
                           , io_rt_ppt  in out pdm_process_products%rowtype )
return number
;

function ppt_perform_delete( i_ppt_pdt_id   in  pdm_process_products.pdt_id%type
 , i_ppt_pcs_id   in  pdm_process_products.pcs_id%type )
return boolean
;

procedure ppt_insert_row ( io_rt_ppt  in out pdm_process_products%rowtype )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ppt_insert_row';
begin
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      
      begin
         insert into pdm_process_products( pdt_id
                                , pcs_id )
              values ( io_rt_ppt.pdt_id
                     , io_rt_ppt.pcs_id )
           returning pdt_id
                   , pcs_id
                into io_rt_ppt.pdt_id
                   , io_rt_ppt.pcs_id;

      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_insertfailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('PDT_ID = "'||io_rt_ppt.pdt_id||'"'
                                                             ||', PCS_ID = "'||io_rt_ppt.pcs_id||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end ppt_insert_row;

function ppt_perform_update( i_ppt_pdt_id   in     pdm_process_products.pdt_id%type
 , i_ppt_pcs_id   in     pdm_process_products.pcs_id%type
                           , io_rt_ppt  in out pdm_process_products%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ppt_perform_update';
begin
   
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         update pdm_process_products
            set pdt_id = io_rt_ppt.pdt_id
              , pcs_id = io_rt_ppt.pcs_id
          where pdt_id = i_ppt_pdt_id
            and pcs_id = i_ppt_pcs_id
      returning pdt_id
              , pcs_id
           into io_rt_ppt.pdt_id
              , io_rt_ppt.pcs_id;

         l_rowcount := sql%rowcount;
      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('PDT_ID = "'||io_rt_ppt.pdt_id||'"'
                                                             ||', PCS_ID = "'||io_rt_ppt.pcs_id||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount)||' rows updated' );

      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end ppt_perform_update;

function ppt_perform_delete( i_ppt_pdt_id   in  pdm_process_products.pdt_id%type
 , i_ppt_pcs_id   in  pdm_process_products.pcs_id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ppt_perform_delete';
begin
   
   declare
      l_found  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         delete
           from pdm_process_products
          where pdt_id = i_ppt_pdt_id
            and pcs_id = i_ppt_pcs_id;

         l_found := sql%found;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );
      return l_found;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'PDT_ID = "'||i_ppt_pdt_id||'"'
                                                         ||', PCS_ID = "'||i_ppt_pcs_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end ppt_perform_delete;

function ppt_update_row( i_ppt_pdt_id   in     pdm_process_products.pdt_id%type
                        , i_ppt_pcs_id   in     pdm_process_products.pcs_id%type
                       , io_rt_ppt  in out pdm_process_products%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ppt_update_row';
begin
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         ppt_lock_row( i_ppt_pdt_id   =>  i_ppt_pdt_id
 , i_ppt_pcs_id   =>  i_ppt_pcs_id );

         
         l_rowcount := 
            ppt_perform_update( i_ppt_pdt_id   =>  i_ppt_pdt_id
 , i_ppt_pcs_id   =>  i_ppt_pcs_id
                              , io_rt_ppt  => io_rt_ppt );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount) ||' rows updated');
      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   => substr('PDT_ID = "'||io_rt_ppt.pdt_id||'"'
                                                          ||', PCS_ID = "'||io_rt_ppt.pcs_id||'"'                                                           , 1, 4000));
   end;                                                          
end ppt_update_row;

function ppt_delete_row( i_ppt_pdt_id   in  pdm_process_products.pdt_id%type
                         , i_ppt_pcs_id   in  pdm_process_products.pcs_id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ppt_delete_row';
begin
   declare
      l_deleted  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         ppt_lock_row( i_ppt_pdt_id   =>  i_ppt_pdt_id
          , i_ppt_pcs_id   =>  i_ppt_pcs_id );

         
         l_deleted := ppt_perform_delete( i_ppt_pdt_id   =>  i_ppt_pdt_id
 , i_ppt_pcs_id   =>  i_ppt_pcs_id );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

      return l_deleted;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'PDT_ID = "'||i_ppt_pdt_id||'"'
                                                      ||', PCS_ID = "'||i_ppt_pcs_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end ppt_delete_row;


end pdm_ppt_tapi_pck;
/
